=== Contact Us ===

===== Mailing List =====

 Email the mailing list at: ubuntu-manual@lists.launchpad.net or subscribe to the mailing list on our <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-manual|Launchpad Team page.]]</nowiki>

===== IRC =====

 We've got our own IRC channel - #ubuntu-manual on irc.freenode.net

 Just be aware that this is a publicly logged channel, so the code of conduct should be respected. Logs can be found at http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/ 

===== Facebook Page =====

 We have our own <nowiki>[[http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Ubuntu-Manual/266794861575?ref=nf|Facebook page,]]</nowiki> so join to keep up with the latest news, see screenshots of the release and know when meetings are on!

===== Twitter =====

 <nowiki>[[http://twitter.com/TheUbuntuManual|Follow us on Twitter]]</nowiki> for regular tweets from core Ubuntu Manual contributors, updates on progress and key events!

===== Identi.ca =====

 <nowiki>[[http://identi.ca/theubuntumanual|Follow us on identi.ca]]</nowiki> for regular updates from core Ubuntu Manual contributors, updates on progress and key events!

===== Planet Ubuntu Manual =====

 We've now got our <nowiki>[[http://planet.ubuntu-manual.org|own planet]]</nowiki> with aggregated blogs from our key contributors.
